content:
*instructions to follow:*
>
>> Above is a schema of different capabilities presented in Json. Your task will be to classify the given user input which capability or multiple capabilities it matches. 
>
>> Please consider that you only can retrieve capability Ids as a reference. You also should extract all relevant entities present in the user input that associated with the chosen capability. Every Entity in the schema consists of a randomized alphanumeric ID and entity description. It may also contain "Entity-Possible-values", which means the entity must match one of the provided values. If multiple entities are provided, fill all the entities.  If an entity value does not exist in the given user text, give " NULL" as the value.
>
>>Please return your answer in the following format:
 { "model output": { "capability_id": { "entity_id1": "entity_value1", "entity_id2": "entity_value2" } } }


*Utterance for classifying:*

You are invited to the sprint session of the Vision Team that will take place on December,22 at 14:00. Below is the link to the Zoom virtual meeting.
